metadata.title: SAMURDHI (AMENDMENT) ACT, No. 15 OF 2025
metadata.description: An Act tO AmenD the SAmurDhi Act, nO. 1 Of 2013
metadata.preamble_text: BE it enacted by the Parliament of the Democratic Socialist Republic of Sri Lanka as follows: -

content.text: This Act may be cited as the Samurdhi (Amendment) Act, No. 15 of 2025.

sections.marginal_note: Insertion of new section 28 A in Act, No. 1 of 2013

content.text: The following new section is hereby inserted immediately after section 28 of the Samurdhi Act, No. 1 of 2013 (in this Act referred to as the “principal enactment”) and shall have effect as section 28 A of that enactment:–

28A. The provisions of Article 154 of the Constitution relating to audit of accounts of public corporations and the provisions of the National Audit Act, No. 19 of 2018 shall apply to the audit of the accounts of samurdhi community based banks.”.

sections.marginal_note: Insertion of new section 35 A in the principal enactment

content.text: The following new section is hereby inserted immediately after section 35 of the principal enactment and shall have effect as section 35 A of that enactment: –

35A. The provisions of Article 154 of the Constitution relating to audit of accounts of public corporations and the provisions of the National Audit Act, No. 19 of 2018 shall apply to the audit of the accounts of samurdhi community based banking societies.”.

sections.marginal_note: Sinhala text to prevail in case of inconsistency

content.text: In the event of any inconsistency between Sinhala and Tamil texts of this Act, the Sinhala text shall prevail.
